Articles.Content:
So, i built a rocket, that was going to test a orbital tug. Right when i launched i noticed this.

So, either my rockets have been been using cigarettes and are now paying for it. Or i fouled something up.
Ewww. Nasty. Greenpeace will have your head for this. Maybe you should use NERVAS? They produce clean, blue flame

*scream

Pollution!!!

Ksc control: can SOMEONE get Jeb out of the thruster??

Idk why that would happen... But I think if it were a bit more towards grey it'd look a little realistic
Seems the Kerbals have resorted to using coal as rocket fuel.

Seems the Kerbals have resorted to using coal as rocket fuel.

Jeb: Shovel Faster Bill! We're only at 10,000m!

Not accusing Airbornem of anything but that would be a great way to find out pirates. If the game finds out that you've pirated the game the smoke gets black and the engines loose 90% of their thrust.
Did you turn on fallback shaders by any chance?

Not accusing Airbornem of anything but that would be a great way to find out pirates. If the game finds out that you've pirated the game the smoke gets black and the engines loose 90% of their thrust.

That is a good idea, but SQUAD would have to make sure legit players never get black smoke.

Did you turn on fallback shaders by any chance?

Nope, This was done on my laptop, so i can play on Lowish-medium settings.
are you using RP-1 fuel on LH2 engines?

Jeb: Shovel Faster Bill! We're only at 10,000m!

Bill: I can't do eet, Captain! There isn't enough!

Bill: I can't do eet, Captain! There isn't enough!

Jeb: do it anyways!!

Jeb: do it anyways!!

Bill: Okay! Bob, I need your highly flammable body over here! it's uhh... Your birthday!
Someone's trying to make your program look bad! Quick! You must find the saboteur.

Bob: oh no, I know how this is going...

Jeb: bob, get over here (>O\/O)>

Bob: aaaaaahhhhh!!!

Bob: oh no, I know how this is going...

Jeb: bob, get over here (>O\/O)>

Bob: aaaaaahhhhh!!!

...Meanwhile

Mission control: we've lost contact with the crew.

Mission control controller: Say what?

Mission control:...There is an empty EVA suit being jettisoned...

*scream

Pollution!!!

Ksc control: can SOMEONE get Jeb out of the thruster??

Idk why that would happen... But I think if it were a bit more towards grey it'd look a little realistic

Hydrogen-oxygen rockets aren't famous for their CO2 output (when in flight at least, the construction and cooling is horrifically polluting).

...Meanwhile

Mission control: we've lost contact with the crew.

Mission control controller: Say what?

Mission control:...There is an empty EVA suit being jettisoned...

A hour later Bob was found in the next rocket launch, apparently unaware of his death.

Hydrogen-oxygen rockets aren't famous for their CO2 output (when in flight at least, the construction and cooling is horrifically polluting).

don't you mean h2o ??

Not accusing Airbornem of anything but that would be a great way to find out pirates. If the game finds out that you've pirated the game the smoke gets black and the engines loose 90% of their thrust.

Who in their right mind would pirate this game? On a top ten list, this game don't rate a negative number lol, pirate a sandbox.......
It might be that they smoke graphic did load properly.

It might be that they smoke graphic did load properly.

That's what i was thinking. Because it only happened that one time. And only with the mainsail engines.

That's what i was thinking. Because it only happened that one time. And only with the mainsail engines.

It's probably this; I've had the same bug with various part textures.
That effect occurs sometimes when fallback shaders are turned on. I have no idea what fallback shaders are, only that they make the IVA windows impossible to see through as well...

Or i fouled something up.

When you filled it up with fuel, are you certain the bowser was not marked Diesel?

Must be an error with the graphics, because they're squares.

Either that, or Jebediah's flying.
